plot: In this Italian Fable a young girl(Gianna) is worried about her papa, who is returning late from a near by village. To get home he must travel through a forest that is inhabited by a beast....
title: Molte Lampadine
plot_es: In this Italian Fable a young girl(Gianna) is worried about her papa, who is returning late from a near by village. To get home he must travel through a forest that is inhabited by a beast....
